concept.title: RPC
concept.shortdesc: The RPC destination passes data over the WAN to an RPC origin. Use the RPC destination as part of an origin pipeline.

conbody.p: RPC destinationoverviewdestinationsRPCWhen you configure the RPC destination, you specify the RPC ID and RPC connections to use. You can optionally enable SSL to pass data securely and define retry and timeout properties.
